info.name: Omni Channel - RCS with Fallback
info.description:
RCS is transforming the way businesses engage with their customers by offering an interactive and dynamic messaging experience that surpasses traditional SMS and WhatsApp. 

With Exotel's RCS APIs, you can now introduce images, videos, interactive CTAs, and powerful yet personalized carousels.
